name: Terbinafine Hydrochloride

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications:
Terbinafine tablets are indicated for the treatment of onychomycosis of the toenail or fingernail due to dermatophytes (tinea unguium). 
                  Prior to initiating treatment, appropriate nail specimens for laboratory testing [potassium hydroxide (KOH) preparation, fungal culture, or nail biopsy] should be obtained to confirm the diagnosis of onychomycosis.
contraindications: Prior to administering, evaluate patients for evidence of chronic or active liver disease. ( 2.1 ) Fingernail onychomycosis: One tablet, once daily for 6 weeks. ( 2.2 ) Toenail onychomycosis: One tablet, once daily for 12 weeks. ( 2.2 )
warningsAndPrecautions:
Terbinafine Tablets, USP are supplied as white, oblong, unscored tablets debossed "B" and "526" on one side and plain on the other side.
                  NDC: 72162-1595-1: 100 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  Store Terbinafine Tablets, USP at 20째 - 25째C (68째 - 77째F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:
                  Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.
                  Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions:
Terbinafine tablets are contraindicated in patients with:
                  
                     Chronic or active liver disease [see Warnings and Precautions (5.1)]
                     
                     History of allergic reaction to oral terbinafine because of the risk of anaphylaxis [see Adverse Reactions (6.2)]
